channel.title: Web Client Problem
channel.description: I have signed and Uploaded the Jar file to my site. I have created a html document containg the following information [img]http://img168.imageshack.us/img168/2551/clientfuckal0.png[/img] Heres what i put in client.html [code] <html> <title>Bashscape Web Client</title> <center><applet name="app" width="765" height="503" archive="http://www.bashscape.info/Client.jar" code="Client"> </applet></center> </html> [/code] Heres the link so you can see [url=http://www.bashscape.info/client.html]www.bashscape.info/client.html[/url] What am i doing wrong?

item.title: Web Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

I have signed and Uploaded the Jar file to my site. I have created a html document containg the following information

Heres what i put in client.html

<html>
<title>Bashscape Web Client</title>
<center><applet name="app" width="765" height="503" 
archive="http://www.bashscape.info/Client.jar" code="Client">
</applet></center>
</html>

Heres the link so you can see www.bashscape.info/client.html
What am i doing wrong?

Read full topic
